title: Hollow Earth Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/19
itunes:title: Hollow Earth Theory - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/19
description:
George Noory and author Tim Swartz discuss his book exploring the voyage of Admiral Richard Byrd to the North Pole, where he allegedly found a secret passage to enter the Earth's core.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
